casebody.data:
In re D.L.W., D.L.N.W., V.A.W. No. 252PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 5, 2016. Jeffrey William Gillette, Franklin, for Wade, Marisha Nicole. Jamie L. Hamlett, for Alamance County DSS. Derrick J. Hensley, for D.L.W., et al. Dammien Worth, for Worth, Dammien Lamar. Kathleen Arundell Jackson, for N.C. Association of Department of Social Services Attorneys. Rachael J. Hawes, for N.C. Association of Department of Social Services Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of January 2016 by Respondent (Mother):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of January 2016."

Respondent (Mother) shall have up to and including the 25th day of January 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
